metadata.synopsis: Two goofy crooks kidnap twin little girls (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) who have left home to get out of their mother's hair.

reviews: Bright colors, silly jokes and one-dimensional characters inhabit ABC's "let's put our in-house stars to use" vehicle, To Grandmother's House We Go. While somewhat crass for the season, this Christmas spec will amuse the very young.
